description: Poseidona is an innovative Barcelona-based startup founded by two women focused on extracting high-value protein ingredients from algae. With a commitment to sustainability, they utilize by-products from agar production and conduct research on invasive Mediterranean algae. Their goal is to create cleaner, plant-based alternatives for various food applications while promoting a circular economy. The project has garnered significant investment and aims to address both environmental challenges and the demand for healthier food options.
name: Poseidona
